section: rover.py examples/rover.py Go to the documentation of this file.00001 # Adapted from https://github.com/zi-w/Ensemble-Bayesian-Optimization/tree/master/test_functions 00002 # See https://arxiv.org/pdf/1706.01445.pdf 00003 # See https://github.com/dietmarwo/fast-cma-es/blob/master/tutorials/RobotRover.adoc for a detailed description. 00004 00005 # Tested using https://docs.conda.io/en/main/miniconda.html on Linux Mint 21.2 00006 00007 import numpy as np 00008 import scipy.interpolate as si 00009 00010 import sys 00011 from loguru import logger 00012 00013 logger.remove() 00014 logger.add(sys.stdout, format="{time:HH:mm:ss.SS} | {process} | {level} | {message}", level="INFO") 00015 logger.add("log_{time}.txt", format="{time:HH:mm:ss.SS} | {process} | {level} | {message}", level="INFO") 00016 00017 class Trajectory: 00018 00019 def __init__(self): 00020 pass 00021 00022 def set_params(self, start, goal, params): 00023 raise NotImplemented 00024 00025 def get_points(self, t): 00026 raise NotImplemented 00027 00028 @property 00029 def param_size(self): 00030 raise NotImplemented 00031 00032 00033 class PointBSpline(Trajectory): 00034 """ 00035 dim : number of dimensions of the state space 00036 num_points : number of internal points used to represent the trajectory. 00037 Note, internal points are not necessarily on the trajectory. 00038 """ 00039 00040 def __init__(self, dim, num_points): 00041 self.tck = None 00042 self.d = dim 00043 self.npoints = num_points 00044 00045 """ 00046 Set fit the parameters of the spline from a set of points. If values are given for start or goal, 00047 the start or endpoint of the trajectory will be forces on those points, respectively. 00048 """ 00049 00050 def set_params(self, params, start=None, goal=None): 00051 00052 points = params.reshape((-1, self.d)).T 00053 00054 if start is not None: 00055 points = np.hstack((start[:, None], points)) 00056 00057 if goal is not None: 00058 points = np.hstack((points, goal[:, None])) 00059 00060 self.tck, u = si.splprep(points, k=3) 00061 00062 if start is not None: 00063 for a, sv in zip(self.tck[1], start): 00064 a[0] = sv 00065 00066 if goal is not None: 00067 for a, gv in zip(self.tck[1], goal): 00068 a[-1] = gv 00069 00070 def get_points(self, t): 00071 assert self.tck is not None, "Parameters have to be set with set_params() before points can be queried." 00072 return np.vstack(si.splev(t, self.tck)).T 00073 00074 @property 00075 def param_size(self): 00076 return self.d * self.npoints 00077 00078 00079 def simple_rbf(x, point): 00080 return (1 - np.exp(-np.sum(((x - point) / 0.25) ** 2))) 00081 00082 00083 class RoverDomain: 00084 """ 00085 Rover domain defined on R^d 00086 cost_fn : vectorized function giving a scalar cost to states 00087 start : a start state for the rover 00088 goal : a goal state 00089 traj : a parameterized trajectory object offering an interface 00090 to interpolate point on the trajectory 00091 s_range : the min and max of the state with s_range[0] in R^d are 00092 the mins and s_range[1] in R^d are the maxs 00093 """ 00094 00095 def __init__(self, cost_fn, 00096 start, 00097 goal, 00098 traj, 00099 s_range, 00100 start_miss_cost=None, 00101 goal_miss_cost=None, 00102 force_start=True, 00103 force_goal=True, 00104 only_add_start_goal=True, 00105 rnd_stream=None): 00106 self.cost_fn = cost_fn 00107 self.start = start 00108 self.goal = goal 00109 self.traj = traj 00110 self.s_range = s_range 00111 self.rnd_stream = rnd_stream 00112 self.force_start = force_start 00113 self.force_goal = force_goal 00114 00115 self.goal_miss_cost = goal_miss_cost 00116 self.start_miss_cost = start_miss_cost 00117 00118 if self.start_miss_cost is None: 00119 self.start_miss_cost = simple_rbf 00120 if self.goal_miss_cost is None: 00121 self.goal_miss_cost = simple_rbf 00122 00123 if self.rnd_stream is None: 00124 self.rnd_stream = np.random.RandomState(np.random.randint(0, 2 ** 32 - 1)) 00125 00126 # return the negative cost which need to be optimized 00127 def __call__(self, params, n_samples=1000): 00128 self.set_params(params) 00129 00130 return -self.estimate_cost(n_samples=n_samples) 00131 00132 def set_params(self, params): 00133 self.traj.set_params(params + self.rnd_stream.normal(0, 1e-4, params.shape), 00134 self.start if self.force_start else None, 00135 self.goal if self.force_goal else None) 00136 00137 def estimate_cost(self, n_samples=1000): 00138 # get points on the trajectory 00139 points = self.traj.get_points(np.linspace(0, 1.0, n_samples, endpoint=True)) 00140 # compute cost at each point 00141 costs = self.cost_fn(points) 00142 00143 # estimate (trapezoidal) the integral of the cost along traj 00144 avg_cost = 0.5 * (costs[:-1] + costs[1:]) 00145 l = np.linalg.norm(points[1:] - points[:-1], axis=1) 00146 total_cost = np.sum(l * avg_cost) 00147 00148 if not self.force_start: 00149 total_cost += self.start_miss_cost(points[0], self.start) 00150 if not self.force_goal: 00151 total_cost += self.goal_miss_cost(points[-1], self.goal) 00152 00153 return total_cost 00154 00155 @property 00156 def input_size(self): 00157 return self.traj.param_size 00158 00159 00160 class AABoxes: 00161 def __init__(self, lows, highs): 00162 self.l = lows 00163 self.h = highs 00164 00165 def contains(self, X): 00166 if X.ndim == 1: 00167 X = X[None, :] 00168 00169 lX = self.l.T[None, :, :] <= X[:, :, None] 00170 hX = self.h.T[None, :, :] > X[:, :, None] 00171 00172 return (lX.all(axis=1) & hX.all(axis=1)) 00173 00174 00175 class NegGeom: 00176 def __init__(self, geometry): 00177 self.geom = geometry 00178 00179 def contains(self, X): 00180 return ~self.geom.contains(X) 00181 00182 00183 class UnionGeom: 00184 def __init__(self, geometries): 00185 self.geoms = geometries 00186 00187 def contains(self, X): 00188 return np.any(np.hstack([g.contains(X) for g in self.geoms]), axis=1, keepdims=True) 00189 00190 00191 class ConstObstacleCost: 00192 def __init__(self, geometry, cost): 00193 self.geom = geometry 00194 self.c = cost 00195 00196 def __call__(self, X): 00197 return self.c * self.geom.contains(X) 00198 00199 00200 class ConstCost: 00201 def __init__(self, cost): 00202 self.c = cost 00203 00204 def __call__(self, X): 00205 if X.ndim == 1: 00206 X = X[None, :] 00207 return np.ones((X.shape[0], 1)) * self.c 00208 00209 00210 class AdditiveCosts: 00211 def __init__(self, fns): 00212 self.fns = fns 00213 00214 def __call__(self, X): 00215 return np.sum(np.hstack([f(X) for f in self.fns]), axis=1) 00216 00217 00218 class GMCost: 00219 def __init__(self, centers, sigmas, weights=None): 00220 self.c = centers 00221 self.s = sigmas 00222 if self.s.ndim == 1: 00223 self.s = self.s[:, None] 00224 self.w = weights 00225 if weights is None: 00226 self.w = np.ones(centers.shape[0]) 00227 00228 def __call__(self, X): 00229 if X.ndim == 1: 00230 X = X[None, :] 00231 00232 return np.exp(-np.sum(((X[:, :, None] - self.c.T[None, :, :]) / self.s.T[None, :, :]) ** 2, axis=1)).dot(self.w) 00233 00234 00235 def plot_2d_rover(roverdomain, ngrid_points=100, ntraj_points=100, colormap='RdBu', draw_colorbar=False): 00236 import matplotlib.pyplot as plt 00237 # get a grid of points over the state space 00238 points = [np.linspace(mi, ma, ngrid_points, endpoint=True) for mi, ma in zip(*roverdomain.s_range)] 00239 grid_points = np.meshgrid(*points) 00240 points = np.hstack([g.reshape((-1, 1)) for g in grid_points]) 00241 00242 # compute the cost at each point on the grid 00243 costs = roverdomain.cost_fn(points) 00244 00245 # get the cost of the current trajectory 00246 traj_cost = roverdomain.estimate_cost() 00247 00248 # get points on the current trajectory 00249 traj_points = roverdomain.traj.get_points(np.linspace(0., 1.0, ntraj_points, endpoint=True)) 00250 00251 # set title to be the total cost 00252 plt.title('traj cost: {0}'.format(traj_cost)) 00253 print('traj cost: {0}'.format(traj_cost)) 00254 # plot cost function 00255 cmesh = plt.pcolormesh(grid_points[0], grid_points[1], costs.reshape((ngrid_points, -1)), cmap=colormap) 00256 if draw_colorbar: 00257 plt.gcf().colorbar(cmesh) 00258 # plot traj 00259 plt.plot(traj_points[:, 0], traj_points[:, 1], 'g') 00260 # plot start and goal 00261 plt.plot([roverdomain.start[0], roverdomain.goal[0]], (roverdomain.start[1], roverdomain.goal[1]), 'ok') 00262 00263 return cmesh 00264 00265 00266 def generate_verts(rectangles): 00267 poly3d = [] 00268 all_faces = [] 00269 vertices = [] 00270 for l, h in zip(rectangles.l, rectangles.h): 00271 verts = [[l[0], l[1], l[2]], [l[0], h[1], l[2]], [h[0], h[1], l[2]], [h[0], l[1], l[2]], 00272 [l[0], l[1], h[2]], [l[0], h[1], h[2]], [h[0], h[1], h[2]], [h[0], l[1], h[2]]] 00273 00274 faces = [[0, 1, 2, 3], [0, 3, 7, 4], [3, 2, 6, 7], [7, 6, 5, 4], [1, 5, 6, 2], [0, 4, 5, 1]] 00275 00276 vert_ind = [[0, 1, 2], [0, 2, 3], [0, 3, 4], [4, 3, 7], [7, 3, 2], [2, 6, 7], 00277 [7, 5, 4], [7, 6, 5], [2, 5, 6], [2, 1, 5], [0, 1, 4], [1, 4, 5]] 00278 00279 plist = [[verts[vert_ind[ix][iy]] for iy in range(len(vert_ind[0]))] for ix in range(len(vert_ind))] 00280 faces = [[verts[faces[ix][iy]] for iy in range(len(faces[0]))] for ix in range(len(faces))] 00281 00282 poly3d = poly3d + plist 00283 vertices = vertices + verts 00284 all_faces = all_faces + faces 00285 00286 return poly3d, vertices, all_faces 00287 00288 00289 def plot_3d_forest_rover(roverdomain, rectangles, ntraj_points=100): 00290 from matplotlib import pyplot as plt 00291 from mpl_toolkits.mplot3d.art3d import Poly3DCollection, Line3DCollection 00292 00293 # get the cost of the current trajectory 00294 traj_cost = roverdomain.estimate_cost() 00295 00296 # get points on the current trajectory 00297 traj_points = roverdomain.traj.get_points(np.linspace(0., 1.0, ntraj_points, endpoint=True)) 00298 00299 # convert the rectangles into lists of vertices for matplotlib 00300 poly3d, verts, faces = generate_verts(rectangles) 00301 00302 ax = plt.gcf().add_subplot(111, projection='3d') 00303 00304 # plot start and goal 00305 ax.scatter((roverdomain.start[0], roverdomain.goal[0]), 00306 (roverdomain.start[1], roverdomain.goal[1]), 00307 (roverdomain.start[2], roverdomain.goal[2]), c='k') 00308 00309 # plot traj 00310 seg = (zip(traj_points[:-1, :], traj_points[1:, :])) 00311 ax.add_collection3d(Line3DCollection(seg, colors=[(0, 1., 0, 1.)] * len(seg))) 00312 00313 # plot rectangles 00314 ax.add_collection3d(Poly3DCollection(poly3d, facecolors=(0.7, 0.7, 0.7, 1.), linewidth=0.5)) 00315 00316 # set limits of axis to be the same as domain 00317 s_range = roverdomain.s_range 00318 ax.set_xlim(s_range[0][0], s_range[1][0]) 00319 ax.set_ylim(s_range[0][1], s_range[1][1]) 00320 ax.set_zlim(s_range[0][2], s_range[1][2]) 00321 00322 def create_cost_small(): 00323 c = np.array([[0.11353145, 0.17251116], 00324 [0.4849413, 0.7684513], 00325 [0.38840863, 0.10730809], 00326 [0.32968556, 0.37542275], 00327 [0.64342773, 0.32438415], 00328 [0.42, 0.35], 00329 [0.38745546, 0.0688907], 00330 [0.05771529, 0.1670573], 00331 [0.48750001, 0.67864249], 00332 [0.5294646, 0.66245226], 00333 [0.88495861, 0.76770809], 00334 [0.71132462, 0.46580745], 00335 [0.02038182, 0.78655373], 00342 [0.50396508, 0.90299952], 00343 [0.23763956, 0.38260748], 00344 [0.40169679, 0.72553068], 00345 [0.59670114, 0.08541569], 00346 [0.5514408, 0.62855134], 00347 [0.84606733, 0.94264543], 00348 [0.8, 0.19590218], 00349 [0.39181603, 0.46357532], 00350 [0.44800403, 0.27380116], 00351 [0.5681913, 0.1468706], 00352 [0.37418262, 0.69210095]]) 00353 00354 l = c - 0.05 00355 h = c + 0.05 00356 00357 r_box = np.array([[0.5, 0.5]]) 00358 r_l = r_box - 0.5 00359 r_h = r_box + 0.5 00360 00361 trees = AABoxes(l, h) 00362 r_box = NegGeom(AABoxes(r_l, r_h)) 00363 obstacles = UnionGeom([trees, r_box]) 00364 00365 start = np.zeros(2) + 0.05 00366 goal = np.array([0.95, 0.95]) 00367 00368 costs = [ConstObstacleCost(obstacles, cost=20.), ConstCost(0.05)] 00369 cost_fn = AdditiveCosts(costs) 00370 return cost_fn, start, goal 00371 00372 00373 def create_small_domain(): 00374 cost_fn, start, goal = create_cost_small() 00375 00376 n_points = 10 00377 traj = 0.87110846], 00501 [0.04959159, 0.535785]]) 00502 00503 l = c - 0.025 00504 h = c + 0.025 00505 00506 r_box = np.array([[0.5, 0.5]]) 00507 r_l = r_box - 0.5 00508 r_h = r_box + 0.5 00509 00510 trees = AABoxes(l, h) 00511 r_box = NegGeom(AABoxes(r_l, r_h)) 00512 obstacles = UnionGeom([trees, r_box]) 00513 00514 start = np.zeros(2) + 0.05 00515 goal = np.array([0.95, 0.95]) 00516 00517 costs = [ConstObstacleCost(obstacles, cost=20.), ConstCost(0.05)] 00518 cost_fn = AdditiveCosts(costs) 00519 return cost_fn, start, goal 00520 00521 00522 def create_large_domain(force_start=False, 00523 force_goal=False, 00524 start_miss_cost=None, 00525 goal_miss_cost=None): 00526 cost_fn, start, goal = create_cost_large() 00527 00528 n_points = 30 00529 traj = PointBSpline(dim=2, num_points=n_points) 00530 n_params = traj.param_size 00531 domain = RoverDomain(cost_fn, 00532 start=start, 00533 goal=goal, 00534 traj=traj, 00535 start_miss_cost=start_miss_cost, 00536 goal_miss_cost=goal_miss_cost, 00537 force_start=force_start, 00538 force_goal=force_goal, 00539 s_range=np.array([[-0.1, -0.1], [1.1, 1.1]])) 00540 return domain 00541 00542 class NormalizedInputFn: 00543 def __init__(self, fn_instance, x_range): 00544 self.fn_instance = fn_instance 00545 self.x_range = x_range 00546 00547 def __call__(self, x): 00548 return self.fn_instance(self.project_input(x)) 00549 00550 def project_input(self, x): 00551 return x * (self.x_range[1] - self.x_range[0]) + self.x_range[0] 00552 00553 def inv_project_input(self, x): 00554 return (x - self.x_range[0]) / (self.x_range[1] - self.x_range[0]) 00555 00556 def get_range(self): 00557 return np.array([np.zeros(self.x_range[0].shape[0]), np.ones(self.x_range[0].shape[0])]) 00558 00559 00560 class ConstantOffsetFn: 00561 def __init__(self, fn_instance, offset): 00562 self.fn_instance = fn_instance 00563 self.offset = offset 00564 00565 def __call__(self, x): 00566 return self.fn_instance(x) + self.offset 00567 00568 def get_range(self): 00569 return self.fn_instance.get_range() 00570 00571 from fcmaes.optimizer import De_cpp, Bite_cpp, wrapper, logger 00572 from fcmaes import retry 00573 from scipy.optimize import Bounds 00574 00575 def main(): 00576 def l2cost(x, point): 00577 return 10 * np.linalg.norm(x - point, 1) 00578 00579 domain = create_large_domain(force_start=False, 00580 force_goal=False, 00581 start_miss_cost=l2cost, 00582 goal_miss_cost=l2cost) 00583 n_points = domain.traj.npoints 00584 00585 raw_x_range = np.repeat(domain.s_range, n_points, axis=1) 00586 00587 # maximum value of f 00588 f_max = 5.0 00589 f = ConstantOffsetFn(domain, f_max) 00590 f = NormalizedInputFn(f, raw_x_range) 00591 x_range = f.get_range() 00592 00593 bounds = Bounds(x_range[0], x_range[1]) 00594 00595 def negated(x): # negation because we minimize 00596 return -f(x) 00597 00598 logger.info("rover retry.minimize(wrap(f, dim), bounds, De_cpp(10000), num_retries=32)") 00599 for i in range(20): 00600 retry.minimize(wrapper(negated), bounds, optimizer=De_cpp(10000), num_retries=32) 00601 00602 logger.info("rover retry.minimize(wrap(f, dim), bounds, Bite_cpp(10000), num_retries=32)") 00603 for i in range(20): 00604 retry.minimize(wrapper(negated), bounds, optimizer=Bite_cpp(10000), num_retries=32) 00605 00606 00607 if __name__ == "__main__": 00608 main()
